description: A Spring Boot REST controller advice class providing centralized exception handling for validation errors, not found errors, conflict errors, framework exceptions, and generic exceptions in a flight status service platform.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A controller advice class handling various exceptions globally within the application, returning standardized API error responses.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation exceptions caused by invalid method arguments, returning detailed validation error information.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles custom not found exceptions, returning a 404 error response.

methods.name: handleConflict
methods.description: Handles conflict exceptions, returning a 409 error response.

methods.name: handleSpringErrorResponse
methods.description: Handles framework-specific error response exceptions, preserving the original ProblemDetail.

methods.name: handleOther
methods.description: Handles all other uncaught exceptions, returning a generic 500 error response.

methods.name: messageForFieldError
methods.description: Utility method for generating default validation error messages.
